entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • discrepancy between TcpClient constructor and Connect method #67879
  • Timeouts in `System.Text.Json.Tests` on arm32 #67878
  • Custom apphost fails to flush nettrace file on shutdown #67877
  • StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase does not consistently match ToUpperInvariant #67873
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Expose method to get system message for system error code #67872
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'fgDomsComputed' during 'Determine first cold block' (Tier0-FullOpts) #67871
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(constIndexOffset % elemSize) == 0' #67870
    7.0.0
  • ARM64 - GT_MADD - do not emit 'msub' in code-gen #67869
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Poolable / Resettable CBOR Readers #67868
  • Rolling build failure: LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Diagnostics.StringMarshallingForwardingNotSupported_ReportsDiagnostic #67864
  • crossgen2 fails on assemblies that include embedded types #67855
  • System.Text.Tests.Perf_StringBuilder.Append_Char_Capacity has regressed on x86 #67854
    7.0.0
  • [tests][tvOS] Some System.IO tests are failing #67853
  • S.P.C PDB is being overwritten by NativeAOT PDB in folder #67851
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enable JsonEncodedText to be initialized with already encoded bytes. #67850
  • crossgen2 fails when a Managed C++ dll is passed as a reference assembly #67849
  • System.Diagnostics.Perf_Process.GetProcessById has regressed 50% on Windows #67847
  • [source build] use of undeclared identifier 'kSecUseDataProtectionKeychain' #67846
  • The thread pool's global queue doesn't scale well on machines with a large processor count #67845
    7.0.0
  • Help: .Net 6 and emitting IL to call constructors and methods that have pointers as arguments #67844
  • Aot Compiler need to handle increased RequiresDynamicCode scope #67843
  • EqualityComparer<TEnum?>.Default allocates #67842
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: APIs for working with unix file mode #67837
  • Struct values with no set fallback to default. #67835
  • ecdh sharekey #67832
    Future
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.SerializationWithPerTypeAttributeContextTests.RoundTripIndexViewModel #67830
  • Test failure System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests.ConcurrentQueueTests.ManyConcurrentAddsTakes_CollectionRemainsConsistent #67828

Closed

  • Determine if/how to handle default timeouts in RegexGenerator #59491
    7.0.0
  • dotnet test host process crashed on Ubuntu 20.04 #60685
  • CoreCLR's dbgshim is moving into dotnet/diagnostics repo #65017
    7.0.0
  • [Localization] Confirm English sentence #67556
    7.0.0
  • [Localization] Improvement for English resouce #67555
    7.0.0
  • GZipCompressor implemented in netstandard2.0 package not working in .NETFramework4.8 #65665
  • Blazor Webassembly - Debugger crashes app #66149
  • Assemblies compiled in 6.0 and main contain an incorrect TargetPlatformAttribute in their metadata #64616
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] windows specific performance regression #66615
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow IReadOnlyDictionary GetValueOrDefault parameter key to be nulllable #67738
  • Generation of references will generate several changes #67784
  • [Mono] Official build fails with libdbgshim.so missing from manifest #67829
  • Test failure profiler\\gc\\gc\\gc.cmd #67826
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark GCStressIncompatible and similar tests as out-of-proc #67876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix inadvertent logical AND #67875
    area-System.Speech
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1711663 #67874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers error reported in Issue #65633 #67867
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update Roslyn test sdk. #67865
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Enable installation on Ubuntu 22.04 - add libssl3 dependency #67862
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 5.0.x
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Asynchronous opening of QuicStreams #67859
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Run large file test on its own #67857
    area-System.IO
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #67848
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Annotating Regex library for Native Aot apps #67841
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix off-by-1000 error reported in issue#67807 #67834
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67833
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix exception and enable event logging when service has no name #67827
    area-System.ServiceProcess

Merged

  • Explicitly referencing the latest Netstandard library #67866
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Consider `Type.IsByRefLike` an intrinsic when possible #67852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use logical and for boolean operation in bstr #67858
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support default timeouts in RegexGenerator #67775
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Added test for extracting zip files with invalid characters in Windows #67332
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono] Avoid trying to fork to a debugger on tvos. #67856
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update xlf files #67863
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update message based on offline feedback. #67860
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add libssl3 dependency to Debian DEPS package #67705
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.x
  • Removing of unused parameter #67836
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Added the `hard_limit_exceeded_p` back as without it, we won't be retrying another heap to fit the new allocation. #67724
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add more diagnostics info for LookupProperty assert failure #67838
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Small MsQuicStream reafactorings #67839
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Reenable SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.ClientSettingsReceived_Success test #67418
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add CoverageIncludeTests mention to coverage.md #67779
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix dbgshim entry in platform manifest #67831
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure-installer

Updated

  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • S.S.C.Cose: Add Async Stream-based signatures #67786
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Code fix to add DisableRuntimeMarshalling when required #67676
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add iOS Startup Scenario (Runtime side) #67670
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Adding Regex.EnumerateMatches #67794
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Add/use CustomTypeMarshaller implementations for string marshalling #67635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • ARM64 - Emitting `msub` instruction #66621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #67825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67746
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67759
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix hanging of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • add code to read active listeners on FreeBSD #64433
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Add C instrumentation to native libs (Native PGO) #67820
  • Handle concurrent reads and concurrent writes on MsQuicStream #67329
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix a thread pool test #67399
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Faster IndexOf for arm64 #67811
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fixed error messages on collections indexing #67696
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix for number of used frame infos during crossgen2 compilation #64549
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Adding missing SDK assets for Publish #67765
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix exception thrown when MsQuicStream write direction is locally aborted #67753
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use SystemNative_GetTimestamp to calculate BootTime #67589
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
